We tested the controllers of some views where the longer tasks are executed
with swingworker(in a separate thread). For the tests we used Thread.yield()
before asserting to wait till these tasks are done. This works fine when it
runs in the ide but not when we run the test via the ant junit task. Via ant
the currentthread don't yield long enough and the testing starts before the
tasks are done .
After some try and error we found that the thread only waits long enough if
we put in three times Thread.yield().
But it's not a very elegant solution.
Is there an other solution to solve this ?

Bart
